name: Neuro-Scrambler
description: A small vial of shimmering liquid containing nanobots engineered to disrupt neural pathways. It is often used by runners in high-stakes negotiations or during clandestine meetings.

attributes.effect: Heals 10 HP with chance to resist elemental damage

flavor.rationale: In a world where mental influence and psychic abilities are becoming increasingly prevalent, the Neuro-Scrambler provides an edge against manipulation and unwanted probing into one's thoughts.
